setAppLabel(String) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.ResolveSettings
Sets the app label name that defines the blukii Info App white label Note: the app label has to be also defined on the blukii Info Manager (https://manager.blukiiinfo.com).
setBackgroundScanType(int) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.DiscoverySettings
Sets the scheduling type of the scan if the app is on background

The values are integer values and can be: DiscoverySettings.SCANTYPE_OFF: scan is off DiscoverySettings.SCANTYPE_ALTERNATE: after each scan duration scan is pause for one wait duration DiscoverySettings.SCANTYPE_CONTINUOUS: scan is continuously on
setCacheEnabledOnBackground(boolean) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.ResolveSettings
Sets the state if cache is enabled when App is in background.
setCacheEnabledOnForeground(boolean) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.ResolveSettings
Sets the state if cache is enabled when App is in foreground.
setCacheEnabledOnScreenOff(boolean) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.ResolveSettings
Sets the state if cache is enabled when device screen is off or locked.
setCacheTimeout(int) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.ResolveSettings
Gets the timeout for the resolver cache.
setCalculatingRssiAverage(boolean) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.DiscoverySettings
Sets the state if discovery should calculate the average RSSI of all scanned frames.
setForegroundScanType(int) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.DiscoverySettings
Sets the scheduling type of the scan if the app is on foreground

The values are integer values and can be: DiscoverySettings.SCANTYPE_OFF: scan is off DiscoverySettings.SCANTYPE_ALTERNATE: after each scan duration scan is pause for one wait duration DiscoverySettings.SCANTYPE_CONTINUOUS: scan is continuously on
setLanguagePriority(String[]) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.ResolveSettings
Sets the language priority that is relevant for the selection of the language specific ResolveData fields like url and title.
setName(String) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.ResolveData
 
setResolveEnabled(boolean) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.ResolveSettings
Sets the state if resolver is enabled for discovered BLE modules.

setScanBeaconSensorData(boolean) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.DiscoverySettings

setScanDurationMaxCount(int) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.DiscoverySettings
Maximum Number of scan durations after the Bluetooth LE scanner will be restarted!
setScanEddystoneData(boolean) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.DiscoverySettings
Sets the state if discovery should scan for Eddystone data.
setScanIBeaconData(boolean) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.DiscoverySettings
Sets the state if discovery should scan for iBeacon data.

setScanNonBlukiis(boolean) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.DiscoverySettings
Sets the state if discovery should also scan for non blukii BLE modules.
setScanWaitDuration(int) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.DiscoverySettings
Sets the wait duration between two discovery phases.
setScreenOffScanType(int) - Method in class com.blukii.sdk.info.DiscoverySettings
Sets the scheduling type of the scan if the app is on screen off (inclusive lock screen)

The values are integer values and can be: DiscoverySettings.SCANTYPE_OFF: scan is off DiscoverySettings.SCANTYPE_ALTERNATE: after each scan duration scan is pause for one wait duration DiscoverySettings.SCANTYPE_CONTINUOUS: scan is continuously on
